com.jdroid.android.activity

Interface ComponentIf

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ActivityIf, FragmentIf
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAboutDialogFragment, AbstractDialogFragment, AbstractFragment, AbstractFragmentActivity, AbstractGridFragment, AbstractListFragment, AbstractLocalSearchFragment, AbstractMapFragment, AbstractPaginatedGridFragment, AbstractPaginatedListFragment, AbstractPreferenceFragment, AbstractSearchFragment, ActivityHelper, AlertDialogFragment, ChoiceItemDialogFragment, ContextualActivity, ContextualListFragment, DatePickerDialogFragment, DebugSettingsActivity, DebugSettingsFragment, ErrorDialogFragment, FacebookAuthenticationFragment, FragmentContainerActivity, FragmentHelper, GooglePlayUtils.DownloadAppDialogFragment, GooglePlayUtils.UpdateAppDialogFragment, GooglePlusHelperFragment, InAppBillingFragment, InAppBillingGridFragment, InAppBillingHelperFragment, PictureDialogFragment, TimePickerDialogFragment, UseCaseFragment, WizardActivity

    • Method Detail

      • executeOnUIThread

        void executeOnUIThread(Runnable runnable)
        Runs the specified action on the UI thread. If the current thread is the UI thread, then the action is executed immediately. If the current thread is not the UI thread, the action is posted to the event queue of the UI thread. If the current Activity is not equals to this, then no action is executed
        Parameters:
        runnable - the action to run on the UI thread

      • findView

        <V extends android.view.View> V findView(int id)
        Finds a view that was identified by the id attribute from the XML that was processed in Fragment.onCreateView(android.view.LayoutInflater, android.view.ViewGroup, android.os.Bundle)
        Type Parameters:
        V - The View class
        Parameters:
        id - The id to search for.
        Returns:
        The view if found or null otherwise.

      • inflate

        android.view.View inflate(int resource)
        Inflate a new view hierarchy from the specified xml resource.
        Parameters:
        resource - ID for an XML layout resource to load
        Returns:
        The root View of the inflated XML file.

        Returns:

        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
